{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot Inc","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1851968,"totalDownVotes":114218,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[üî• üîµ UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":272579,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üî• üîµ UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1229699,"totalDownVotes":240186,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars üéÇ [CTF!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":104486,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üî•üî• Updates every Friday at 3:00pm PST, 6:00pm EST üî•üî•

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select ‚ÄúRedeem Item‚Äù to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":743856,"totalDownVotes":327818,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23338,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":4546767,"creatorName":"Pressure Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":431670,"totalDownVotes":22341,"universeId":2937673012,"name":"[‚è≥] ‚ö°Clicker Simulator!","placeId":7560156054,"playerCount":24478,"imageToken":"T_7560156054_e0eb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"NEW UPDATE COMING SATURDAY AT 12:00 PM EST!

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2702607,"totalDownVotes":347523,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royaleüè∞High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":26878,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!

‚ô°Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls‚ô°","genre":""},{"creatorId":14179659,"creatorName":"FLOPPA#1","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":422143,"totalDownVotes":40688,"universeId":3451663900,"name":"raise a floppa ‚úä","placeId":9203864304,"playerCount":26829,"imageToken":"T_9203864304_5c93","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"you can't stop us roblox ","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1619937,"totalDownVotes":88974,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14154,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üß∏ Bee Swarm Simulator toys are available now at Walmart Supercenters and Smyths Toys! Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":151848836,"creatorName":"haz3mn","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":217192,"totalDownVotes":18041,"universeId":3317679266,"name":"PLS DONATE üí∏ [UPDATE]","placeId":8737602449,"playerCount":11560,"imageToken":"T_8737602449_c867","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üí∞ PLS DONATE is a game where you can claim stands and make it say anything you want! You can donate or make Robux by having clothing or gamepasses on sale. Your items for sale will automagically appear on your stand! 

‚ö†Ô∏è Donations are done through clothing and gamepass sales, which can take up to a week to receive. The Robux shown in-game is the price at the time of sale. The Robux you receive may be less due to Roblox taxes. You can see your pending Robux here: https://www.roblox.com/transactions

Bot Clash is a battle simulator game where you and your loyal Bots travel across the planets to fight for humanity's last hope!

üí• Battle against different enemies including bosses!
